data.text: Ao me kra, kamfo Awurade;
Ao me kra, kamfo Awurade,
ɔno na ɔde wo mfomsoɔ nyinaa kyɛ woɔ
ɔgye wo nkwa firi damena mu
ɔde nnepa ma wo sɛ wʼapɛdeɛ
Awurade yɛ adetenenee
Ɔkyerɛɛ Mose nʼakwan,
Mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne ɔdomfoɔ ne Awurade,
Ɔrenkɔ so mmɔ soboɔ,
Ɔrenhwɛ yɛn bɔne ne yɛn nni sɛdeɛ ɛfata
Na sɛdeɛ ɔsoro ne asase ntam ware no,
Sɛdeɛ apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ ntam ware no,
Sɛdeɛ agya yam hyehye no ne mma ho no,
na ɔnim sɛdeɛ wɔyɛɛ yɛn,
Ɔdasani deɛ, ne nna te sɛ ɛserɛ,
sɛ mframa bɔ fa ne so a, na ɔnni hɔ,
Nanso ɛfiri mmerɛsanten kɔsi nnasanten
wɔn a wɔdi nʼapam no so
Awurade asi nʼahennwa wɔ soro,
Monkamfo Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼabɔfoɔ,
Monkamfo Awurade, ɔsoro asafo nyinaa,
Monkamfo Awurade, ne nnwuma nyinaa
